data.name: My Doctor is a Futanari
data.detailed_description:
Frequent headaches are starting to get in the way of you everyday life.
You find a Doctor online, set an appointment and give her a visit.
Things take an unexpected turn however, when a simple checkup turns intimate.

Will your new GP be able to resolve your qualms?

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
Sexy Voice Acting
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

data.short_description: A visit to a local Doctor takes an unsuspected turn, when a simple checkup turns intimate. Will your new GP be able to resolve your qualms?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy My Doctor is a Futanari
